channel.title: BlueScar! 317
channel.description:
[b][size=10pt]Hello, Before i talk about i id like to say "yes i did just use someone's else client and server" but un-like most other kids that leech i intend on doing major modding to both client and server[/size].[/b]
*[b]BlueScar[/b]*
FEATURE'S
-It's is Going to be a RS like Server........not slow xp though atleast 3x xp rate.
-[b]NO OUTRAGES ITEM PRICES OR SHOPS WITH EVER RARE ITEM IN IT![/b]
-Hamachi serer (my port's dont work for some reason so i would never be able to use no-ip)
-Quest System soon [1 quest sofar]
i would greatly appriceate scripting help or any kid cuase igot no staff for it =-(
server is already up though! http://z15.invisionfree.com/Vindication1/index.php?showtopic=199&st=0
-almost all weapon spec's work!
-MiniGame's
[IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm88/orgoth88/0009-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i294.photobucket.com/albums/mm88/orgoth88/0008-1.png[/img]

BlueScar Is a Hamachi server!

item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

This is for server development, not advertisement. Anyway if you want to advertise your server go to the status page, and don’t use Hamachi because it’s shitty and insecure.
